task.title: Migrating to Log4j 2
task.shortdesc: Beginning in Pivotal GemFire 8.1, GemFire now supports Apache Log4j 2 for use as GemFire's logging system. If you are upgrading your applications from an older version of GemFire, perform these steps to migrate to Log4j 2.

context.p: This procedure describes how to move from the existing GemFire LogWriter API logging system to using Apache Log4j 2 for your GemFire application logging. If you do not perform these steps, then GemFire will by default use the existing, legacy LogWriter APIs.

step.cmd: Import the LogService and log4j Logger:
Define a private static final logger instance for the class (non-static would introduce too many instances and impact memory):

info.codeblock: private static final Logger logger = LogService.getLogger();
